about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Young, close-knit cooperative
about.description: Nature Pistachio is a recently formed cooperative of farmers in Corral de Almaguer, committed to quality pistachio. We started on a small scale, with clear processes and responsible growth alongside distributors who value origin.
about.missionText: Produce high-quality pistachio through sustainable practices, prioritizing closeness, transparency, and consistency each season.
about.visionText: Grow step by step with commercial partners who appreciate a young, committed cooperative.
about.valuesList: Closeness | Transparency | Quality | Care for the land | Responsible growth
